name: Lateral Shuffle
setup: Stand in athletic stance (knees slightly bent, chest up)
steps: Push off outside foot and step laterally
Trail leg follows quickly (shuffle, don't cross feet)
Shuffle prescribed distance, then reverse direction
safety: Ensure clear space. Start slow to master footwork before increasing speed.

progressions: Shuffle with resistance band around ankles

prescriptionHints.notes: Essential for basketball and lateral movement prep.

joints.notes: Keep knees tracking over toes. Land softly on balls of feet.
